CustomField.description: This is an Advanced Formula field which looks up the Total Quote Lines in the Primary Opportunity Quote which are Taxable and summates this amount in a Field. Our Estimates & Invoices created in Pandadoc lookup this field to determine Sales Tax Amounts for clients. Quickbooks does not lookup this field as Quickbooks automatically adds Sales Tax based on the 'Taxable' field on the Product Records.
